description: This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number W6888-224568/A dated 2022-07-15 with a closing of 2022-08-10 at 14:00. It is for the rental of the container, and the collection and disposal of International Waste. A 40-yard enclosed leak-proof and lockable storage container is required on a rental basis, the period of the standing offer will be for three years. The requirement is to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO). This requirement is to be submitted via Ariba Discovery. Reissue of Request for Standing Offers. Title: For the rental of the container, and the collection and disposal of International Waste.
tags: Inorganic hazardous waste collection and disposal
full_summary:
# International Waste Disposal Tender

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3559628324
* **Publication Date**: May 29, 2023
* **Closing Date and Time**: June 23, 2023 - 2:00 PM EST

## Tender Title

* **English**: W6888-224568-B - International Waste Disposal
* **French**: W6888-224568-B - L'élimination de déchets internationaux

## Government Entity

* **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC - K1A 0S5
* **Country**: Canada

## Contract Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit tenders for the supply and delivery of a 40-yard enclosed, leak-proof, and lockable storage container on a rental basis. This requirement aims to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the rental of the container and the collection and disposal of international waste.

## Notice Details

* **notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except the National Capital Region)
* **Goods Classification**: Hazardous Waste Disposal (UNSPSC Code: 76121900 and 76121905)

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Vashti Ramnarine (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date**: June 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Unexpected Contract Start Date**: July 27, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 28, 2025

Please note that all required documentation and bids must be submitted by the closing date and time. Late submissions will be considered non-responsive. You can find the full tender details on the Ariba Discovery portal.  #tenderannouncement #iwastemanagement #procurementprocessowards [docUrlAvailableHereWillNeedDFPCocumentationieuseOUtilitiesLondonPlandament documentationtrie dapat(FundraVJhorluappli
